Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Northbound Reroute near 24th Pl/King Drive
ShortDescription: Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, I-55, State, Cermak, and Michigan, due to police activity near 24th Pl/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, I-55, State, Cermak, and Michigan, due to police activity near 24th Pl/King Drive.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Jeff Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Jefferson Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
